Name: Glad Eye Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
30 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: This minty aniseed cocktail takes more than its colour from the green fairy.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 'The Savoy Cocktail Book'.
Nutrition: One serving of Glad Eye Cocktail contains 256 calories
